articles.description: Axis Bank Ltd is quoting at Rs 714.8, down 1.56% on the day as on 13:24 IST on the NSE. The stock jumped 12.34% in last one year as compared to a 38.98% rally in NIFTY and a 28.52% spurt in the Nifty Bank index.
